pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw: I think so actually. That sounds like it describes exactly what the constant is. You could keep "NUM" for the bases constant, but then it's more accurate to call the `WINDOW_NUM` constant `WINDOW_INDEX` which admittedly would turn it into `WINDOW_INDEX_INDEX`. I'm not sure what the best solution is. I think no matter what the naming is going to be weird because the data structure is weird.
content.html: I think so actually. That sounds like it describes exactly what the constant is. You could keep "NUM" for the bases constant, but then it's more accurate to call the WINDOW_NUM constant WINDOW_INDEX which admittedly would turn it into WINDOW_INDEX_INDEX. I'm not sure what the best solution is. I think no matter what the naming is going to be weird because the data structure is weird.
